Welcome to the
Preserve The Peace Community!


We're a global community supporting each other with our own mental health journeys. To preserve the peace, the inner peace.

Who We Are

Above all, Preserve The Peace is a vibrant online community of people all around the world, dedicated to supporting each other's mental health journeys. Beyond our online community, we created a mental health support network, offering advantages such as open peer support groups and mental health workshops and programs in our local region in WW-P(West-Windsor and Plainsboro) open to all, at no cost.

How We Support Our Community

We understand that mental health isn't something you get to hear about everyday. That's why Preserve The Peace offers the following programs to support the members of our community, all totally free of charge in order to raise awareness and breakdown the modern stigma and ongoing challenge of mental health! To make the best use of these programs, please join us on Discord Placeholder! If you are already a part of our community, you can apply for each of our programs below.

Join Our Team

We are always looking for high school and college students to help support our community! Whether you are good at art, like to post on social media, have great scores on tests and in school, want to share your college application journey with others, or like writing articles, there's always a position for you on our team!

Get Involved!

Support Our Mission

As a 501(c)(3) non-profit, Preserve The Peace relies on the generosity of donors to keep our organization running smoothly and to continue providing our community programs (like our local programs and webinars idk) free of charge. All donations, no matter how small, go directly to helping us reach more students and maintain our worldwide community.

  Donate Now!
